meta.source: Entropia Wiki + Discord Guide + Spreadsheet Data

stage_0_starter.name: Starter Equipment
stage_0_starter.description: Initial gear from Beginner Box and leveling rewards
stage_0_starter.source: Beginner Box + NPC Merchants in cities
stage_0_starter.milestone_1: Open Beginner Box and equip Cloak of Honor + Glyph
stage_0_starter.milestone_2: Activate power-ups and setup Auto Power-Ups
stage_0_starter.milestone_3: Complete first journey across Flaris for permanent Stat Point

stage_1_shiny.name: Shiny Entropia Equipment
stage_1_shiny.description: First endgame gear set focused on building foundation
stage_1_shiny.weapon_note: Buy 2 weapons - second for Fusion after Platin 50
stage_1_shiny.weapon_element_cards: A and 7% cards from Jewel Manager Peach, better cards from players or Rhisis' Trail
stage_1_shiny.weapon_diamonds: Never fails, vendor: Jewel Exchanger Peach, sources: dungeons or buy from players
stage_1_shiny.armor_source_1: Les Britannia Dungeon (boss drops Shiny Entropia Treasure Chests)
stage_1_shiny.armor_source_3: Buy from NPC Dren (in front of dungeon) with dungeon coins
stage_1_shiny.accessories: Shiny Entropia Accessory Set (unlocked at Platinum 30, 40, 50)
stage_1_shiny.fashion_dragon_mask: Buy with ECP from Weapon Trader Charly
stage_1_shiny.pet_early: INT Fox (hatch eggs until you get one, level to S rank at Pet Tamer Dominik)
stage_1_shiny.shield_templar: Behemoth's Shield from Ankou's Asylum (don't forget if playing Templar!)
stage_1_shiny.important_note_1: Bonuses on Shiny items don't transfer to Black upon merging

stage_2_black_shiny.name: Black Shiny Entropia Equipment
stage_2_black_shiny.description: Mid-tier endgame gear with significant stat improvements
stage_2_black_shiny.weapon_drop_1: Black weapon materials (exchange at Aurania Quest Exchanger Tina)
stage_2_black_shiny.weapon_drop_2: Black Shiny Weapon Box (rare direct drop)
stage_2_black_shiny.weapon_merge_scroll: Scroll of Weapon Merge (from Aurania Quest Exchanger Tina)
stage_2_black_shiny.weapon_merge_loses: Diamonds (unless removed with magic diamonds first - not recommended)
stage_2_black_shiny.weapon_upgrade_sources: Shiny dungeon exchangers or buy from players
stage_2_black_shiny.armor_source: Magma Cave (boss drops individual set parts)
stage_2_black_shiny.armor_merge_scroll_normal: Scroll of Armour Merge (from Kebaria Exchange Maria) - LOSES AWAKENINGS
stage_2_black_shiny.armor_merge_scroll_special: Scroll of Armour Merge (Special) - KEEPS AWAKENINGS (recommended)
stage_2_black_shiny.accessories_recipe: Buy Accessory Recipe at Smiths in Flaris
stage_2_black_shiny.accessories_upgrade: Check Aurania NPC for next exchange option
stage_2_black_shiny.fashion_set: Black Dragon Fashion Set (from Eden Dungeon)
stage_2_black_shiny.utility_ancient_glyph: Ancient Glyph (drops from Eden, recipe from Alchemy NPC)
stage_2_black_shiny.key_warning: If you die in Venux, you lose all quest items in inventory!
stage_2_black_shiny.buff_pet_option_1: Unicorn CS-Pet (from Venux) -> upgrades to Horse CS-Pet
stage_2_black_shiny.important_note_1: Black equipment bonuses MATTER for damage/HP and Soulreaver Sacrifice
stage_2_black_shiny.important_note_2: Unneeded Shiny parts can be sold to NPCs or recycled
stage_2_black_shiny.important_note_3: High bonus stat parts can be turned into Spirit Dice

stage_3_soulreaver.name: Soulreaver Equipment
stage_3_soulreaver.description: High-tier gear required for Royal Level progression and endgame systems
stage_3_soulreaver.weapon_drop_1: Soulreaver Relics (exchange at NPC Raziel in Ethral)
stage_3_soulreaver.weapon_merge_scroll: Scroll of Weapon Merge (Soulreaver) from Ethral Exchanger Raziel
stage_3_soulreaver.weapon_upgrade_target: +6 minimum (new upgrade system with stat boosts)
stage_3_soulreaver.armor_source: Trigrem Ruins (boss drops individual set parts)
stage_3_soulreaver.armor_merge_note: Merge scrolls are expensive - only merge good parts to save Perin
stage_3_soulreaver.fashion_requirements: Bring various items from across Entropia to Gaia NPC in Flaris
stage_3_soulreaver.cards_upgrade_target: Z-Cards and 15% Cards for maximum damage
stage_3_soulreaver.critical_importance_1: Required to damage monsters in Royal 0-10 content
stage_3_soulreaver.critical_importance_2: Without high-quality Soulreaver Set, HP won't survive monster attacks
stage_3_soulreaver.critical_importance_3: Necessary for crafting special power-ups at Royal 15+
stage_3_soulreaver.critical_importance_5: Quality determines buff strength in endgame systems

stage_4_ultimate_utilities.name: Ultimate Utilities
stage_4_ultimate_utilities.description: Premium quality-of-life items to make dungeon farming easier
stage_4_ultimate_utilities.acquisition_1: Buy from other players (recommended - no donation needed)
stage_4_ultimate_utilities.recommendation: Not all Ultimate items are equal - check Ingame Item Wiki for stats
stage_4_ultimate_utilities.note_1: Optional but helpful for farming higher dungeons
stage_4_ultimate_utilities.note_2: All characters can be equipped just by playing the game

stage_5_royal.name: Royal Equipment
stage_5_royal.unlock_requirement: Royal Level 10 (or Royal Level 6 with Boost Token)
stage_5_royal.description: Endgame equipment tier with unique upgrade system
stage_5_royal.upgrade_system: Completely new upgrade system with drastically increased costs per level
stage_5_royal.important_note_1: Royal items DO NOT require merging from previous tiers
stage_5_royal.important_note_2: Old Soulreaver equipment still needed for Trance and power-ups
stage_5_royal.important_note_3: Must have quality Soulreaver to survive Royal 0-10 content
stage_5_royal.important_note_4: Costs increase drastically with each upgrade level

stage_6_endgame.name: Endgame Activities
stage_6_endgame.description: True endgame content and infinite progression
stage_6_endgame.activity_1: Continue leveling (more content unlocks with Royal Level)
stage_6_endgame.activity_2: Upgrade Royal Set and Weapons (new upgrade system)
stage_6_endgame.activity_3: Sacrifice Soulreaver Equipment for Trance mode (Royal 15)
stage_6_endgame.activity_4: Upgrade Soulreaver Accessories to Omega tier (Royal 15)
stage_6_endgame.royal_15_unlocks: Trance mode, Royal Accessory sacrifice system, Omega upgrades

initial_setup.second_account: Tank (Seraph preferred, or Templar as second choice)
initial_setup.third_account: Force Master (reaches 175, stays in collector fields as party buffer)
initial_setup.fourth_account: Seraph Buffer (skip if already using Seraph as tank)
initial_setup.first_step_1: Vote for server (up to 5 times per day for Vote Points)
initial_setup.first_step_2: Press Ctrl+G and join a guild for buffs and help
initial_setup.first_step_3: Press L and join a party with full buffs
initial_setup.first_step_4: Use /buff next to party buffers in collector fields (press V to find them)
initial_setup.first_step_5: Buy 1 day of Premium from Vote Shop (Start → Premium Items → Entropia Shop)
initial_setup.first_step_6: Press O and propose to one of your other characters (couple bonuses)

level_1_60.level_1_action_2: Equip Cloak of Honor and Glyph
level_1_60.level_1_action_4: Setup Auto Power-Ups (Start → Features → Auto Power-Ups)
level_1_60.level_1_action_6: Kill first Aibatt, then change class to Magician
level_1_60.level_1_60_action_1: Kill monsters while journeying across Flaris
level_1_60.level_1_60_action_2: Activate Celestial Statue for permanent Stat Point
level_1_60.level_1_60_action_4: Assign all skill points to INT (Press H)
level_1_60.ftool_setup: Press O, drag 'Attack the selected target' to first hotbar slot, activate checkbox, type /ToggleFtool

level_60_121.level_60_90_action_1: Don't enter dungeon - kill Bangs outside
level_60_121.level_60_90_action_2: Receive Arcanist Box, open and equip
level_60_121.level_90_action_1: Visit NPC shop area (not player shops)
level_60_121.level_90_action_3: Buy best gear available (~10 million Penya budget)
level_60_121.level_90_action_4: Look for Angel and Elder equipment
level_60_121.level_90_121_action_1: Press K and drag new attack skill to action slot

platinum_1_5.step_1: Use one of 30 Blue Platinum Scrolls from inventory
platinum_1_5.step_2: Use Penya to /awake new Shiny Equipment and Fashion Set
platinum_1_5.tip: Platinum 3 area is great for Penya farming in first few minutes

platinum_5_shopping.pet_tamer_dominik_1: 7 Bead Slot Keys for Buff Pet
platinum_5_shopping.pet_tamer_dominik_2: Eggs and Hatching Promoters (hatch until INT Fox)
platinum_5_shopping.pet_tamer_dominik_3: Talk with NPC until pet reaches Level S
platinum_5_shopping.alchemy_ruboru: Create first potion using recipe (if you have 5,000 Entropia Seeds)
platinum_5_shopping.upgrade_action: Upgrade equipment to maximum affordable level
platinum_5_shopping.materials_vendor: Buy more Oricalkum and Moonstones from NPC Wafor

platinum_5_35.platin_15_20_note: Switch between Meteoga, EVA Storm, and Cosmic Element (use multiple Action Slots)
platinum_5_35.pet_change: Replace INT Fox with Bloodhunter at Platin 30
platinum_5_35.traseia_tip: After flying, resummon pets using Equipment Switch (Start → Features → Equip Switch, drag Vs to hotbar)

platinum_35_40.shopping_1: Buy 2 Shiny Entropia Staffs from Charly (next to Wafor)
platinum_35_40.shopping_2: Second staff for Fusion after Platin 50
platinum_35_40.dungeon_action_2: Use Holy Scrolls and Resurrection Scrolls from Laura
platinum_35_40.dungeon_action_3: As Arcanist, kite boss during rage mode
platinum_35_40.dungeon_action_5: Buy missing equipment from NPC Dren (in front of dungeon)
platinum_35_40.dungeon_action_6: Buy Scrolls of Uprotect and Ultra Oricalkums with remaining coins
platinum_35_40.tip_1: Sell unneeded Shiny parts to NPCs
platinum_35_40.tip_3: Turn high bonus parts into Spirit Dice (Start → Features → Spirit Dice)
platinum_35_40.gear_prep_1: Upgrade new gear (focus on main weapon, get equipment to +10)
platinum_35_40.gear_prep_2: Buy Lightspeed Dragon King's Mask from Wafor
platinum_35_40.gear_prep_3: Buy Glorious Dragon Cloak from Wafor
platinum_35_40.gear_prep_4: Use Scrolls of INT on gear
platinum_35_40.gear_prep_5: Prepare power-ups for Platin 40 in Entropia Forest
platinum_35_40.farming_tip: Platin 37 area is best for Penya farming until you can 1-hit monsters in Oasis

platinum_41_50.note: New EXP% power-ups required (old ones no longer work)
platinum_41_50.tip_3: Farm in older zones or Oasis for Penya if needed

npc_bobochan_flaris.name: Upgrade Specialist BoboChan
npc_bobochan_flaris.service_1: Safe upgrade option for weapons and equipment
npc_bobochan_flaris.service_2: Pierce suits (4 times) and weapons (10 times)
npc_bobochan_flaris.service_3: Add elements to weapons and suits

npc_ruboru.name: Alchemy Ruboru
npc_ruboru.service: Create potions with recipes and materials

npc_dren.name: NPC Dren
npc_dren.location: In front of Les Britannia / Abyssal Cove
npc_dren.item: Shiny Entropia Equipment parts (bought with dungeon coins)

npc_maria.name: Kebaria Exchange Maria
npc_maria.item_2: Scroll of Armour Merge (Special) - keeps awakenings

npc_tina.name: Aurania Quest Exchanger Tina
npc_tina.item_1: Black Weapon Boxes (exchange from Black materials)

npc_raziel.name: Ethral Exchanger Raziel
npc_raziel.item_1: Soulreaver Weapon Boxes (exchange from Soulreaver Relics)

npc_gaia.name: Gaia NPC
npc_gaia.service: Upgrade Black Fashion Set to Gaia Fashion Set

dungeon_les_britannia.name: Les Britannia
dungeon_les_britannia.tip_1: Buy Holy Scrolls and Resurrection Scrolls from Laura
dungeon_les_britannia.tip_2: Arcanists can kite boss during rage mode
dungeon_les_britannia.tip_3: First dungeon experience for new players

dungeon_abyssal_cove.name: Abyssal Cove
dungeon_abyssal_cove.tip_2: Recycle unneeded parts or turn high bonus parts into Spirit Dice

dungeon_magma_cave.name: Magma Cave
dungeon_magma_cave.boss_drop: Individual Black Shiny Equipment Set parts

dungeon_venux.name: Venux
dungeon_venux.danger: If you die, you lose ALL quest items in inventory!

dungeon_trigrem_ruins.name: Trigrem Ruins
dungeon_trigrem_ruins.tip: Only merge good parts - merge scrolls are expensive

dungeon_gaia.name: Gaia Dungeon
dungeon_gaia.purpose: Upgrade Black Fashion Set to Gaia Fashion Set
dungeon_gaia.requirements: Bring various items from across Entropia to Gaia NPC

dungeon_premium.name: Premium Dungeon
dungeon_premium.note: Can equip all characters with Ultimate items just by playing - no donation required

currency_ecp.name: Entropia Chip Perin (ECP)
currency_ecp.use_1: Buy Shiny Entropia Weapons (100 ECP each)

currency_penya.name: Penya
currency_penya.use_1: Buy gear from NPCs and players

currency_vote_points.name: Vote Points
currency_vote_points.earned_from: Voting for server (up to 5 times per day)

currency_dungeon_coins.name: Dungeon Coins
currency_dungeon_coins.use_2: Buy upgrade materials (Scrolls of Uprotect, Ultra Oricalkum, etc.)

system_awake.special_merge: Use Scroll of Armour Merge (Special) to keep awakenings when merging to Black

system_buff.usage: Stand next to buffer characters in collector fields
system_buff.setup_1: Press V to see collector fields
system_buff.setup_2: Create Force Master for party buffing

system_auto_powerups.setup: Fill window with all common power-ups obtained throughout game
system_auto_powerups.note: Scroll of Experience Ultra can be stacked up to 5x

system_ftool.setup_2: Drag 'Attack the selected target' emote to first hotbar slot
system_ftool.setup_4: Type /ToggleFtool in chat (or drag command to hotbar)

system_equipment_switch.location: Start → Features → Equip Switch (shortcut in Inventory)
system_equipment_switch.purpose: Quick equipment changes (useful for resummoning pets after flying)

system_spirit_dice.purpose: Convert high bonus stat equipment into Spirit Dice

system_couple.command: Press O and propose to another character
system_couple.recommendation: Propose to one of your alt accounts

system_premium.purchase: Vote Shop (Start → Premium Items → Entropia Shop)
system_premium.recommendation: Buy 1 day of Premium to start

system_soulreaver_sacrifice.requirement: Quality Soulreaver equipment determines buff strength

location_flaris.description: Main hub - NPCs for upgrades, shops, weapons

tip_beginner_1.tip: Join a guild immediately (Ctrl+G) for powerful buffs and community help

tip_beginner_2.tip: Join a party (L) with full buffs

tip_beginner_3.tip: Vote daily for Vote Points (up to 5 times)

tip_beginner_4.tip: Create at least 3-4 accounts for buffers and farming

tip_beginner_5.tip: Buy 1 day Premium from Vote Shop to start

tip_beginner_6.tip: Propose to alt character for couple bonuses (Press O)

tip_beginner_9.tip: Check Discord for help and create tickets if needed

tip_platinum_1.tip: Platinum 3 area is great for early Penya farming

tip_platinum_2.tip: Platinum 37 area is best Penya farming until Oasis

tip_platinum_3.tip: Replace INT Fox with Bloodhunter at Platinum 30

tip_platinum_4.tip: Buy 2 Shiny Entropia Staffs (second for Fusion after P50)

tip_platinum_5.tip: Use Holy and Resurrection Scrolls in dungeons

tip_platinum_6.tip: Arcanists can kite bosses during rage mode

tip_platinum_7.tip: Recycle or sell unneeded Shiny parts

tip_platinum_8.tip: Turn high bonus parts into Spirit Dice

tip_platinum_10.tip: Old EXP power-ups stop working at Platinum 41+

tip_merging_1.tip: Use Scroll of Armour Merge (Special) to keep awakenings when merging to Black

tip_merging_3.tip: Upgrade levels and cards are always kept

tip_merging_4.tip: Diamonds are lost unless removed first (not recommended)

tip_merging_5.tip: Black equipment bonuses matter for Soulreaver Sacrifice

tip_merging_6.tip: Soulreaver merge scrolls are expensive - only merge good parts

tip_merging_7.tip: Royal equipment does NOT require merging from previous tiers

tip_soulreaver_1.tip: Required to damage monsters in Royal 0-10 content

tip_soulreaver_2.tip: Quality determines survival in Royal zones

tip_soulreaver_3.tip: Needed for Trance mode at Royal 15+

tip_soulreaver_5.tip: Quality affects buff strength in endgame

tip_soulreaver_6.tip: Don't skip this tier even after getting Royal gear

tip_endgame_1.tip: Royal upgrade costs increase drastically per level

tip_endgame_2.tip: Keep leveling for more content unlocks

tip_endgame_3.tip: Ultimate items can be obtained without donation

tip_endgame_4.tip: Not all Ultimate items are equal - check stats

tip_endgame_6.tip: Royal 20 and 30 unlock better upgrade materials

mistake_1.mistake: Not joining a guild early (missing buffs)

mistake_3.mistake: Merging bad Soulreaver parts (expensive scrolls wasted)

mistake_4.mistake: Using normal merge scroll instead of special (losing awakenings)

mistake_5.mistake: Removing diamonds from weapons before merging (waste of magic diamonds)

mistake_6.mistake: Skipping Soulreaver tier and going straight to Royal (won't survive)

mistake_7.mistake: Not checking Item Wiki for Ultimate item stats before buying

mistake_8.mistake: Dying in Venux with quest items in inventory

mistake_9.mistake: Not setting up Auto Power-Ups early

mistake_10.mistake: Selling high bonus equipment instead of turning into Spirit Dice

class_early_leveling.stat_priority: All points into INT until Platinum 50
class_early_leveling.skill_121_plus: Meteoga, EVA Storm, Cosmic Element (multiple Action Slots)
class_early_leveling.note: This is for early game only - does not affect final class choice

account_tank.special_note: Templar needs Behemoth's Shield from Ankou's Asylum

account_buffer_2.note: Skip if already using Seraph as tank

additional_notes.exp_scroll_stacking: Scroll of Experience Ultra stacks up to 5x
additional_notes.spreadsheet_source: Entropia_Notes.xlsx contains additional detailed stats, Royal rolls, and dungeon specifics
additional_notes.discord_support: Join Discord for help and create tickets for technical issues
additional_notes.technical_problems: Check FAQ on homepage and 'Technical Game Problems?' in wiki top left
